Ok I have another stupid question. I know rotten noobs like me.
If you tell quest to compile additional files with your game does that mean pictures and sounds too?
I tried that and it didn't work.
And if that is the case when I upload a game with pictures should I just put the game in a compressed folder with the pics and sounds?
I just don't want to do anything too noobish.
Wonderjudge.

Posts.EditableText: It will include pictures and sounds as well - what do you mean by "it didn't work"? Please give us more information. Was there an error message?
Posts.HTML: It will include pictures and sounds as well - what do you mean by "it didn't work"? Please give us more information. Was there an error message?

Posts.EditableText:
The second upload of shipwrecked I had added the pictures in the resources section to be compiled with the game but when the game was downloaded the pictures wouldn't come up.
Were they supposed to?
I can just upload everything in a zip folder so it's not a big deal. I just didn't know if I was doing anything wrong.
Wonderjudge.
